QuestData.Title: SMASH BROODQUEEN
QuestData.Description: <The following is written in very large print.>$B$BSPIDERS IN NORTH CAVE BAD. POISON OGRES. OGRES GET SICK. BAD!$B$BBIG BIG SPIDER IN CAVE MAKE MORE SPIDERS. MORE SPIDERS BAD!$B$BKILL BIG SPIDER, STOP MORE SPIDERS. KILL BIG SPIDER, GET BIG PRIZE! GOOD!$B$B<A crude drawing accompanies this.>
QuestData.CompletionText: Are you here about the sign?$B$BI don't want to talk about it unless you've got proof of a kill.
QuestData.RewardText: By Grom, I'm glad that's over with. If you read that sign you may have some idea how desperate I got after trying to communicate to these lumbering oafs.
